title: Men's Stretch Multi-Use Long Sleeve Dress Shirts Party Prom Wedding Shirts with Slight Sheen
description: Easy Care: machine wash,tumble dry,low temperature ironing,the shirt will keep looking good for a long time after the first ironing.
Non Shrinkage and Slight Stretch:Polyester spandex blend fabric has excellent stability,very durable,not easily deformed,the stretch direction of this shirt is horizontal,left to right.

Fabric: Soft and comfortable fabric, like satin silk, cool to the touch and smooth, this shirt is more shiny than a regular dress shirt, but just the right amount, it's beautiful and stands out, perfect for events like weddings,proms,parties.

Fit Type:Modern Slim Fit,this fit combines modern tailoring with a moderate level of slimness, providing a comfortable and well-fitted look suitable for most body types. It is generally slightly looser than a traditional slim fit.

Occasions:wedding,prom,dinner,valentine's day,dance,band performance,opera,stage,activity,festival,carnival,school celebration,party,nightclub,christmas,halloween,this shirt is also a great choice for casual everyday wear.
